JobTitle: Senior Program Manager-Data & Analytics- Microsoft Advertising
JobFullDesc: Microsoft is the destination for experienced, collaborative, and passionate digital advertising professionals seeking a rewarding career and lifestyle. We offer a compelling portfolio of advertising products, innovative solutions and the opportunity to engage with some of the brightest minds in the digital industry. Microsoft Advertising (MSA) is a worldwide Sales, Marketing and Services organization on the cutting edge of the digital advertising industry. We are the engine that powers the buying and selling of digital advertising across all aspects of our digital portfolio.  Digital advertising will play a critical role in driving post-device sale revenue for Microsoft Services and Devices. Not only does advertising help fund investment in premium content and experiences that consumers love, it also provides a rich, immersive canvas that allows marketers to reach consumers in a relevant manner across services and screens. We have a broad responsibility for network quality and policy, business planning and forecasting, performance management including delivering operational insights, and monetization programs all of which are critical to ensuring the long-term health of our digital advertising buisness. We work with all groups driving monetization improvements including engineering, customer-service operations, advertising sales & marketing, and product management - working across publishers, advertisers and optimizing across the overall network. The team is responsible for developing advanced techniques to turn data into insights; and to drive actions based on those insights end to end. We are currently looking for a Senior Program Manager within our Data & Analytics to lead monetization initiatives, product management and analytics & strategy across Microsoft’s ad-funded consumer services (Focus on Display/Native/Video). In this role you will work closely with Engineering, Publisher, Finance as well as external partners. You will dive into heavy amounts of data and gain an understanding of levers that drive ad products, and how to drive customer adoption of the products. You will have a keen intellect for generating data driven answers to complex product challenges. Equally important is your ability to communicate across a varied range of partners. Understanding of various stages of the Product lifecycle for Ad Products is also key to the success of this role. We are looking for someone who will identify opportunities to optimize monetization across display, video, and native ad formats and to help set the future direction for our marketplace.  The work
